anatomical_location: 1st intercostal space, 6 cun lateral to the midline
healing_function: Regulates Lung Qi, clears heat, treats cough and chest pain

anatomical_location: Below the lateral end of the clavicle, 6 cun lateral to the midline
healing_function: Clears Lung heat, descends Lung Qi
martial_application: Causes breath loss or collapse when struck

anatomical_location: On the anterolateral upper arm, 3 cun below the axillary fold
healing_function: Calms the spirit, clears Lung heat

anatomical_location: On the anterolateral upper arm, 4 cun below the axillary fold
healing_function: Regulates Qi and blood in the chest
martial_application: Pain or paralysis in arm when struck

anatomical_location: At the cubital crease, radial side of the biceps tendon
healing_function: Clears Lung heat, benefits the throat
martial_application: Disrupts arm function or causes numbness

anatomical_location: 5 cun below LU5 on the line connecting LU5 and LU9
healing_function: Clears heat, stops bleeding, relieves pain

anatomical_location: 1.5 cun above the styloid process of the radius
healing_function: Releases exterior, opens the Ren (CV), treats cough and headache
martial_application: Can shock the wrist and chest connection

anatomical_location: 1 cun above LU9 at the radial artery
healing_function: Descends Lung Qi, alleviates cough and wheezing
martial_application: Affects radial nerve and wrist function

anatomical_location: At the wrist joint, in the depression between the radial artery and tendon
healing_function: Tonifies Lung, transforms phlegm, promotes circulation
martial_application: Vulnerable wrist strike, disrupts breath and circulation

anatomical_location: On the thenar eminence of the hand, midpoint of the 1st metacarpal bone
healing_function: Clears Lung heat, benefits the throat and voice
martial_application: Disrupts grip strength, pain in thumb or hand

anatomical_location: Radial side of the thumb, 0.1 cun from the corner of the nail
healing_function: Revives consciousness, clears heat, benefits throat
martial_application: Pressure causes intense pain or unconsciousness
